info.author: Bryan Miller
info.description:
# Gemini Observatory module for the TOM Toolkit

This module adds [Gemini Observatory](https://www.gemini.edu/) support to the TOM
Toolkit. Using this module TOMs can submit observations to the Gemini phase 2
system.

## Installation:

Install the module into your TOM environment:

    pip install tom-gemini

Add `tom_gemini.gemini.GEMFacility` to the `TOM_FACILITY_CLASSES` in your TOM's
`settings.py`:

    TOM_FACILITY_CLASSES = [
        'tom_observations.facilities.lco.LCOFacility'
        ...
        'tom_gemini.gemini.GEMFacility'
    ]
info.name: tom-gemini
info.summary: Gemini Observatory module for the TOM Toolkit

Gemini Observatory module for the TOM Toolkit

This module adds Gemini Observatory support to the TOM Toolkit. Using this module TOMs can submit observations to the Gemini phase 2 system.

Installation:

Install the module into your TOM environment:

pip install tom-gemini

Add tom_gemini.gemini.GEMFacility to the TOM_FACILITY_CLASSES in your TOM's settings.py:

TOM_FACILITY_CLASSES = [
    'tom_observations.facilities.lco.LCOFacility'
    ...
